# Tasks

- [ ]

Estimated Time: XX min

# Writing the Issue

- [ ] List all tasks
- [ ] Estimate time
- [ ] Add labels
- [ ] Add assignees

# Before Starting

- [ ] Read issue description
- [ ] Self-assign
- [ ] Git: Fetch latest main
- [ ] Git: Create branch as {issue-number}-{title} (e.g., 17-create-github-templates)
- [ ] Update outdated packages
- [ ] Run build

# Pre-PR Checks

- [ ] Ensure changes are minimal
- [ ] Add unit tests
- [ ] Add E2E tests
- [ ] Code refactored
- [ ] AI review done, necessary fixes applied
- [ ] Version updated
